channel.title: tutorials on Navendu Pottekkat
channel.description: Recent content in tutorials on Navendu Pottekkat

item.title: An Introduction to Monitoring Microservices with Prometheus and Grafana
item.description: This tutorial walks you through setting up monitoring on a microservice application using Prometheus and Grafana.

item.title: Retro Gaming With RetroPie, GPi CASE 2, and a Raspberry Pi
item.description: A complete tutorial on how to set up RetroPie and play retro games on a GPi CASE 2 with a Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4 under the hood.

item.title: A Quick Start Guide for Mastodon
item.description: Learn to get up and running with the microblogging platform everyone is talking about.

item.title: Adding Diagrams to Your Hugo Blog With Mermaid
item.description: This article shows how you can add diagrams to your Hugo site with Mermaid.

item.title: How and Why I Migrated My Blog From Github Pages to Netlify
item.description: This blog is now deployed on Netlify. Here is how and why I did it.

item.title: How to write an Awesome README
item.description: A comprehensive guide to writing README that stands out and makes people go WOW!
